main event: A series of UFO sightings occurred in Fairfield, Illinois, on August 5 and August 8, 1963, involving various witnesses observing bright lights and objects in the sky.
interesting points: The objects were reported to have hovered, changed direction rapidly, and caused disturbances with vehicle radios., The local deputy sheriff and multiple witnesses confirmed the sightings, describing the objects as larger than typical stars and hovering at low altitudes., Some witnesses reported that their vehicles sputtered or malfunctioned during the sightings., One sighting involved a bright light following a car for several miles before disappearing., The Air Force later classified the objects largely as reflections of Jupiter and meteoric events.
witness description: Local residents, including a deputy sheriff and several families
